data.note: Despite the cash collection rate of 100% of 2012 sales, GPL’s operations had to be subsidized by the government to the tune of $30m (GYD 6bn) as a result of rising fuel costs and capital investment costs.  According to GPL's annual repport, the company remains creditworthy with excellent cash collection rates. No new debts were occasioned in 2012. Current debts attract low interest rates. The latest financial audit report available is from 2012.
data.name: Power offtake risk for independent generators
